text: But King Solomon shall be blessed, and David’s throne shall be established before the LORD forever.”
The son of Shammai: Maon, who was the father of Beth-zur.
descendants of Lebanah, descendants of Hagabah, descendants of Akkub,
Mattathias and his friends went about and tore down the pagan altars;

That is the meaning of the stone you saw hewn from the mountain without a hand being put to it, which broke in pieces the iron, bronze, clay, silver, and gold. The great God has revealed to the king what shall be in the future; this is exactly what you dreamed, and its meaning is sure.”
but not finding him, they returned to Jerusalem to look for him.
they would sell their property and possessions and divide them among all according to each one’s need.
